tool_description: Scans storage locations to discover and catalog backup files with their metadata including size, creation time, database type, and backup type.

storage_locations.description: List of storage paths or URLs to scan for backups

database_types.description: Filter by database types (mysql, postgresql, mongodb, oracle, sqlserver)

backup_types.description: Filter by backup types (full, incremental, differential, log)

error_messages: Storage location not accessible: Ensure all paths in storage_locations are valid and accessible with proper permissions.
Invalid database type filter: Use only supported database types [mysql, postgresql, mongodb, oracle, sqlserver].
Invalid backup type filter: Use only supported backup types [full, incremental, differential, log].
Max depth out of range: Set max_depth between 1 and 10 to prevent excessive recursion.
usage: Provide storage_locations array to scan for backups. Optionally filter by database_types and backup_types, and set max_depth for directory traversal limits.

total_backups_found.description: Total number of backup files discovered

backup_files.description: List of backup file paths found during scan

scan_summary.description: Summary of scan results including any warnings or issues
